title: Anima Mundi OST (1992) Philip Glass
description:
Anima Mundi (1992) Godfrey Reggio 

Original Music by Philip Glass

01 - The Journey - 1:47
02 - The Ark - 4:31
03 - The Garden - 4:35
04 - The Beginning - 4:08
05 - Living Waters - 3:48
06 - Perpetual Motion - 5:34
07 - The Witness - 4:11

CD rip, MP3 Audio: 256 Kbps, 44,100 Hz, 16 Bit, Stereo.

anima_mundi_back_cover.jpg


Awesome short film by the director of Koyaanisqatsi, with 
another amazing score by Philip Glass. 

Errol Morris has said about Glass: "...he creates a feeling 
of existential dread better than anyone else I know of."
